description:
Open Source smartcard driver for Windows

OpenSC provides a set of libraries and utilities to work with smart cards. Its main focus is on cards that support cryptographic operations, and facilitate their use in security applications such as authentication, mail encryption and digital signatures. OpenSC implements the standard APIs to smart cards, e.g. PKCS#11 API, Windowsâ€™ Smart Card Minidriver and macOS CryptoTokenKit.
New in 0.26.1; 2025-01-14
General improvements
- Align allocations of sc_mem_secure_alloc (#3281)
- Fix -O3 gcc optimization failure on amd64 and ppc64el (#3299)
pkcs11-spy
- Avoid crash while spying C_GetInterface() (#3275)
TCOS
- Fix reading certificate (#3296)
